intents.title: 📌 Details for Posting a Property
steps: Fill All Mandatory fields and Click On [Submit] Button
Property Posting is Successful, Will be Visible After Approvals

intents.title: 🔍 Details for Searching Property
steps: Thanks  you,We have got a curated list of properties based on your preference(s)
Please click on [Check Out Properties] Button to check them out!!!
Once a property is shortlisted, click on [Request a Callback] Button.
Our Relationship manager will get in touch with you to provide further assistance
